game.name: Tropico 4: Junta Military DLC
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Time to get military! Secure your rule of Tropico with the new bunker, the "Veteran" character trait for a more battle-hardened military leader and an appropriate dress uniform. Decorate the island with the new guard booths, oberservation tower, ammunitions depot, barricades and a tank!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Time to get military! Secure your rule of Tropico with the new bunker, the "Veteran" character trait for a more battle-hardened military leader and an appropriate dress uniform. Decorate the island with the new guard booths, oberservation tower, ammunitions depot, barricades and a tank!
